channel.title: Activity Report – First Time Flowing
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: Cathulhu
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Tonight I thought of the word “Cathulhu” and I was inspired to create this image. Click on it for a larger version.
item.content:encoded: Tonight I thought of the word “Cathulhu” and I was inspired to create this image. Click on it for a larger version.

item.title: Open Source is Love
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I’ve been learning how to create web sites using Joomla!, an open source content management system. This is primarily for work, but I can envision converting the DreamPunk site over to Joomla! at some point. Additionally, I have upgraded the House of Whack forums to the latest version of phpBB, an open source forum. What […]
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been learning how to create web sites using Joomla!, an open source content management system. This is primarily for work, but I can envision converting the DreamPunk site over to Joomla! at some point.

Additionally, I have upgraded the House of Whack forums to the latest version of phpBB, an open source forum.

What I need to do next is learn how to make custom templates for both of these packages. Give it that personal touch.

item.title: Whack Magnets
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: A few months ago I ordered some printable magnet material and today I used it to print out a set of rooms from House of Whack. Now I can play on the front of my refrigerator.
item.content:encoded: A few months ago I ordered some printable magnet material and today I used it to print out a set of rooms from House of Whack. Now I can play on the front of my refrigerator.

item.title: Photo Submission
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I am accepting photos for a future creative Activity. Please send a photo. I will do something interesting with it and post it here.
item.content:encoded: I am accepting photos for a future creative Activity. Please send a photo. I will do something interesting with it and post it here.

item.title: Free Books
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: For today’s activity, I established a small collection of books to give away/push off on friends who visit. These include some science fiction novels, graphic design books, graphic novels, books on writing and etcetera, etcetera. So, if you come over, please peruse the books and take something.
item.content:encoded:
For today’s activity, I established a small collection of books to give away/push off on friends who visit. These include some science fiction novels, graphic design books, graphic novels, books on writing and etcetera, etcetera.

So, if you come over, please peruse the books and take something.
